price: Inni Isa gadaamessaawwan keessatti akka fedhetti isintolchu.Haqaan gabbaramaan isa malee hin jiru. [Inni] injifataa, ogeessa.
arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي يُصَوِّرُكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡحَامِ كَيۡفَ يَشَآءُۚ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: huwa alladhī yuṣawwirukum fī al-arḥāmi kayfa yashāu lā ilāha illā huwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
